# Become a Trained Leader

There is required training for all of those in any kind of leadership position like Council President, Cubmasters/Scoutmasters, Merit Badge Counselors, Chartering Organization Representatives, Youth leaders of National Youth Leadership Prgram, and more!

## Why do you ask?

Because a trained leader can do their job easier 


# Required Training {-}

View [training requirements](https://www.scouting.org/wp-content/uploads/2025/10/Position-Trained-Requirements-Oct2025.pdf) for your specific position.

::: {.callout-note}
If you are having problems completing your training try the following:
- be sure you have a strong internet connection
- switch your device to a **computer** and use **Google Chrome** or **MS Edge**
- Ensure that cookies JavaScript and pop-ups are all enabled for the enirety of my.scouting.org.
:::
